R for Non-Programmers: A Guide for Social Scientists Welcome

R for Non-Programmers: A Guide for Social Scientists Daniel Dauber 2021-09-23 Welcome Welcome to R for Non-Programmers: A guide for Social Scientists (R4NP). This book is intended to help everyone who wishes to learn how to use R for their own research projects. Each chapter conveys key concepts in data analysis in a comprehensive, compact and accessible manner. R4NP will guide you through your first steps on a possible endless journey full of ‘awe and wonder.’
